parameters.definition: Binary matrix representing the assignment of programmers to jobs
Cost matrix where each cell represents the preference value of the programmer for the job 1 implies that they prefer the job the most.

output.definition: Assignment of each programmer to a job

description: The assignment problem aims to assign programmers to programming jobs based on their preference values. Each programmer ranks the jobs from most to least preferred. The goal is to take into the account the preferences of the programmers by minimizing the sum of their preferences to the jobs they are assigned. We are given the preferences of programmers for each job.
